name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.qjournal.prepare-recovery.timeout.ms
description:
Quorum timeout in milliseconds during preparation phase of
    recovery/synchronization for a specific segment.

name: dfs.namenode.lazypersist.file.scrub.interval.sec
description:
The NameNode periodically scans the namespace for LazyPersist files with
    missing blocks and unlinks them from the namespace. This configuration key
    controls the interval between successive scans. If this value is set to 0,
    the file scrubber is disabled.

name: dfs.namenode.decommission.interval
description:
Namenode periodicity in seconds to check if
    decommission or maintenance is complete. Support multiple time unit
    suffix(case insensitive), as described in dfs.heartbeat.interval.
    If no time unit is specified then seconds is assumed.

name: ha.health-monitor.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout for the actual monitorHealth() calls.

name: dfs.replication
description:
Default block replication. 
  The actual number of replications can be specified when the file is created.
  The default is used if replication is not specified in create time.

name: dfs.namenode.blockreport.queue.size
description: The queue size of BlockReportProcessingThread in BlockManager.

name: dfs.ha.zkfc.port
description:
The port number that the zookeeper failover controller RPC
    server binds to.

name: nfs.wtmax
description:
This is the maximum size in bytes of a WRITE request
    supported by the NFS gateway. If you change this, make sure you
    also update the nfs mount's wsize(add wsize= # of bytes to the 
    mount directive).
